attributes.action: introduce an age related curfew system for minors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's patently obvious that nothing's being done to restrict youth crime for fear of contravening their Human-Rights. Enough is now, enough! It's time for the government to introduce an age related curfew system, and a banning of groups of three or more youths congregating together in public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
